Class CafeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • fun.connor.cafe.controllers.CafeController

  • @ResourceController(value="/cafe")
public class CafeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Lighter resource controller for Cafe related operations

    • Method Detail

      • getNearestCafes

        @Get(value="/nearest")
 @QueryParams(value="count")
public Response<java.util.List<Cafe>> getNearestCafes(java.lang.Integer count)
        A Lighter endpoint method that returns a list of nearby Cafe's. (Currently hard-coded to return test data).
        Parameters:
        count - The maximum number of Cafe's to return
        Returns:
        A JSON response containing a list of Cafes.

      • visitCafe

        @Post(value="/visit")
public Response<CafeVisit> visitCafe(@Body
                                                            Cafe cafe,
                                                            Subject subject)
        A Lighter endpoint method that records a CafeVisit for the given Cafe and Subject. The visit is created with the current timestamp.
        Parameters:
        cafe - the cafe that is being visited
        subject - the subject to perform the visit on the behalf of
        Returns:
        The created CafeVisit, if successful
